text: National Bulk Carriers was a shipping company which owned and operated oil tanker ships and bulk carriers. Some of them were among the largest in the world at that time. It was one of the largest multinational corporations in the world. It was founded by Daniel K. Ludwig. At one time, the company had more than 20,000 employees and "several billion dollars in assets." ==External links== * Ships built by National Bulk Carriers ==References== Category:Shipping companies of the United States
title: National Bulk Carriers
